client_tls_insecure.description: Whether to perform TLS cert verification on the server's certificate. Defaults to `false`.

host.description: The device42 server to interact with.

password.description: The password to authenticate with Device42.

username.description: The username to authenticate with Device42.

custom_fields.description: Any custom fields that will be used in device42.

device_type.description: The type of the device. Valid values are 'physical', 'virtual', 'blade', 'cluster', or 'other'.
